price: the Day when no patron[11] will avail another in the least, nor will they be helped,
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: [11] i.e., protector, close associate, kith and kin, etc.
